paper_abstract: Based on the tangency or non-tangency of the periodic solution to certain surface, this paper gives a set of conditions ensuring global convergence in finite time toward a unique periodic solution for Hopfield neural networks with discontinuous activations. Moreover, two numerical examples are provided to illustrate the theoretical results. (c) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Finite time stability of periodic solution for Hopfield neural networks with discontinuous activations
